name: Victory Lap
description:
Congratulations, hero! You have successfully defeated the dastardly lich and put an end to their evil scheme! What you didn't expect, however, is for the escape to be a race for your life, as the collapsing castle attempts to bring you down with it!

Victory lap is a short game where you play as an unnamed cat adventurer, performing tricky platforming challenges with new curses containing varying effects befalling you at regular intervals. This game was made as part of godot wild jam #54

-Credits-

BGM from Silverman Sound Studios, silvermansound.com

SFX from sfxr.me
